name: Kandji
overview: The Kandji Data Connector is a powerful tool that enables seamless integration between Kandji's cloud-based platform and your engineering applications. It allows you to efficiently manage and monitor your Apple devices, streamlining your device management workflow.
body: With the Kandji Data Connector, you can gain granular insights into device performance and usage patterns. It provides a comprehensive view of your Apple devices, allowing you to effectively deploy, configure, and secure them. Furthermore, the Data Connector enables you to automate tasks and workflows, saving you valuable time and resources.

metrics.title: What are the most popular metrics in Kandji to analyze?

bullets.title: Device Health
bullets.description: Monitor battery health, storage usage, and overall device performance to ensure optimal functionality.

bullets.title: App Usage
bullets.description: Track app usage patterns and make data-driven decisions to optimize productivity and streamline workflows.

bullets.title: Software Updates
bullets.description: Stay on top of software updates and ensure all devices are running the latest, most secure versions.

bullets.title: Security Compliance
bullets.description: Monitor device compliance with security policies and proactively address any potential vulnerabilities.

bullets.title: Inventory Management
bullets.description: Effortlessly track device inventory and ensure accurate asset management across your organization.

bullets.title: Enhanced Device Performance
bullets.description: By analyzing metrics such as device health and app usage, you can identify and troubleshoot performance issues, leading to improved device performance and user experience.

bullets.title: Optimized Workflow
bullets.description: With insights into software updates and security compliance, you can streamline device management processes, reducing downtime and increasing productivity.

bullets.title: Cost Efficiency
bullets.description: Efficient inventory management and proactive monitoring of device health help reduce unnecessary expenses related to repairs and replacements.

bullets.title: Enhanced Security
bullets.description: By monitoring security compliance and ensuring timely updates, you can protect your organization's sensitive data and minimize the risk of security breaches.
